title: Defender's Forge
summaries: The Defender's Forge is a portable, personal storage item which is purchased from the Tavernkeep for 500000*50 [img:Defender Medal] / 750000*75 [img:Defender Medal].

The storage provided by the Defender's Forge is separate from the <linked>Piggy Bank</linked>, <linked>Safe</linked>, and <linked>Void Vault</linked>, so it allows the player to carry significantly more items at any given time.
